about_the_game:
ABOUT CYBERFALL


CyberFall is an open-world survival game set in a post-apocalyptic Cyberpunk setting with base-building and crafting. Players fight to survive against new threats as well as each other.

THE WORLD


At the height of mankind's civilization, the world has been devastated by a mysterious meteor storm that has spread a growth of crystals that has infected the world of nanotech and augmentation. The player will interact with many characters to uncover the secrets of the infection while fighting to build a new civilization and survive.

FEATURE


  • Combat - At the heart of gameplay is a first-person shooter and melee system that allows the player to customize their weapons load-outs, augmentation, and armor to fit their play style.
  • Crafting - In addition to basic crafting, players will also be able to unlock the secrets to augmentation to develop their character into a surviving machine.
  • Base-Building - Scavenge for materials to secure yourself and your belongings from raiders.
  • Scavegening - Make your way into the abandoned parts of the city to scavenge materials and parts.
  • Single and Multi-player - Explore the world on your own or with your friends.
  • Other survival elements - Farming, Fishing, Mining and Gathering will help the player stay alive and build out a new life.

content_descriptors.notes: Cyberfall contains gunplay, and dark and potentially scary moments.

detailed_description:
ABOUT CYBERFALL


CyberFall is an open-world survival game set in a post-apocalyptic Cyberpunk setting with base-building and crafting. Players fight to survive against new threats as well as each other.

THE WORLD


At the height of mankind's civilization, the world has been devastated by a mysterious meteor storm that has spread a growth of crystals that has infected the world of nanotech and augmentation. The player will interact with many characters to uncover the secrets of the infection while fighting to build a new civilization and survive.

FEATURE


  • Combat - At the heart of gameplay is a first-person shooter and melee system that allows the player to customize their weapons load-outs, augmentation, and armor to fit their play style.
  • Crafting - In addition to basic crafting, players will also be able to unlock the secrets to augmentation to develop their character into a surviving machine.
  • Base-Building - Scavenge for materials to secure yourself and your belongings from raiders.
  • Scavegening - Make your way into the abandoned parts of the city to scavenge materials and parts.
  • Single and Multi-player - Explore the world on your own or with your friends.
  • Other survival elements - Farming, Fishing, Mining and Gathering will help the player stay alive and build out a new life.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS / Steam OS
  • Processor: i5 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS / Steam OS
  • Processor: i5-6600 3.3ghz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
